REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0885 reute b f BC-SOVIET-NEGOTIATOR-REP 03-06 0080

TEXT.TITLE: SOVIET NEGOTIATOR REPORTS ARMS TALKS BREAKTHROUGH
TEXT.BODY: Chief Soviet arms negotiator Yuli Vorontsov said Soviet-American talks on cutting medium-range nuclear missiles had made a breakthrough. Vorontsov said he expected a treaty would be ready for signing within three to four months following the latest talks in Geneva. He told a news conference here "all the elements point to optimism" and only technical work on treaty language remained outstanding. REUTER
